tool_description: Verify BIN numbers to assist with fraud prevention or customer verification in your projects.
name: Find Bin Numbers
title: Find Bin Numbers

api_list.name: BIN Number
api_list.description: Returns information specific to the specified BIN Number

api_list.name: MOD 10 Check
api_list.description: Note: This verifies if a credit card number passes the MOD 10 algorithm however it doesn't guarantee that the card number is genuine

optional_parameters.name: card
optional_parameters.description: Credit card number you wish to validate via MOD 10
